q_ch: 顾客是PolyU 的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the cutting tasks for customers who are PolyU?
gt:
Sure! Here are the cutting tasks for the customer "PolyU" based on the available data. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group    | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 1       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-18 00:00:00 | Master Sewers    | 100            | 100              | 2      |
| 4       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-17 00:00:00 | Master Sewers    | 220            | 220              | 1      |
| 5       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Sewers    | 260            | 260              | 1      |
| 2       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Cutters   | 240            | 240              | 1      |
| 3       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-19 00:00:00 | Master Cutters   | 150            | 150              | 2      |
| 31      | 2024-05-10 00:00:00 | 2024-05-26 00:00:00 | Master Cutters   | 260            | 260              | 1      |

- **Status Legend**:
  - 1: Completed
  - 2: In Progress

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for orders placed by the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN ('1', '9');
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for the orders placed by the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.order_product_id IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '31');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the order products associated with the customer "PolyU"
